summary: Swedish agent Hamilton tracks 200 stolen grenades to Russians at the Uzbek/Afghan border. Some men kill both dealers and buyers and steal the grenades. Who are they and what do they want with the grenades?
cast: Mikael Persbrandt|Saba Mubarak|Pernilla August|Jason Flemyng|Lennart Hjulström|Aleksandr Nosik|Ray Fearon|Peter Andersson|Gustaf Hammarsten|Dan Ekborg|David Dencik|Leo Gregory|Fanny Risberg|Liv Mjönes|Kevin McNally|Joseph Beddelem|Cedric Proust|Peter Gardiner|Terry Carter|Michael Anthony Brown|Sandra Andreis|Kristofer Kamiyasu|Anna Lindmarker|Anders Ahlbom Rosendahl|Jannike Grut|Steffan Dozzi|Jakob Isberg|Alexandra Alegren|Ulf Friberg|Ashraf Farah|Igor Lenyov|Mouayad Jouma|Enam Soubuh|Na'em Al-Bsharh|Duncan Bruining|Mikael Karlsson|Bassam Hanna Touma|Maxeem Ayyad|Alex Fatehnia|Patrick Jakobsson|Love Jarl|Sovi Rydén|Ylva Cecilia Waern|Aida Andersson|Vincent de Montleau|Tommy Sporrong
title: Hamilton
